ComicInfo.Summary:
From the snow covered mountains in Warlands' frigid north, to the world's storm-tossed southern seas, a band of heroes struggles to come together to face the planet's greatest threat, the dark soul of Warlands itself. Threatened by the rise of these diverse heroes, this evil force summons a rag-tag army of those inclined toward darkness to its defense. If Warlands is to be exorcized of its ever-present spectre of war and death, our heroes must embark on a quest toward the light, surviving the attacks of a berserk barbarian army, and an ever-stranger array of fierce, unstoppable, supernatural monsters.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/warlands-dark-tide-rising-2/4000-177161/
